SELECT A.PAT_NO, A.PRESC_DATE as PRESC_DATE, A.DISEASE_NM as DISEASE_NM, A.DISEASE_CD as DISEASE_CD, A.DEPT as DEPT, A.DOCT_NM as DOCT_NM, B.PAT_NM as PAT_NM, B.ADDR as ADDR, B.TEL as TEL, '1' as FLAG FROM MC_OUT_PAIENT A RIGHT OUTER JOIN WS_PAT B ON A.PAT_NO = B.PAT_NO GROUP BY A.PAT_NO, A.PRESC_DATE, A.DISEASE_NM, B.PAT_NM, B.ADDR, B.TEL, A.DEPT, A.DOCT_NM, A.DISEASE_CD, A.MID_GRP, A.MEDICATION_YN HAVING A.PRESC_DATE = #{prescDate} AND mid_grp ='약제' AND A.MEDICATION_YN = 'N'
AND A.PAT_NO = #{patNo}

SELECT DISTINCT A.PAT_NO as PAT_NO, A.PRESC_DATE as PRESC_DATE, A.DISEASE_NM as DISEASE_NM, A.DISEASE_CD as DISEASE_CD, A.DEPT as DEPT, A.DOCT_NM as DOCT_NM, B.PAT_NM as PAT_NM, B.ADDR as ADDR, B.TEL as TEL, '2' as FLAG, C.WARD, C.HROOM, C.HOSPTLZ_DATE FROM MC_IN_PAIENT A RIGHT OUTER JOIN WS_PAT B ON A.PAT_NO = B.PAT_NO INNER JOIN WH_HOSPTLZ_RECEIPT C ON A.PAT_NO = C.PAT_NO WHERE A.PRESC_DATE = #{prescDate} AND mid_grp ='약제' AND A.MEDICATION_YN = 'N'
AND A.PAT_NO = #{patNo}

SELECT FEE_CD, FEE_NM, PRESC_DATE, PAT_NO, DISEASE_NM, DISEASE_CD
FROM MC_OUT_PAIENT
FROM MC_IN_PAIENT
WHERE mid_grp ='약제' AND PAT_NO = #{patNo} AND PRESC_DATE=#{prescDate} AND DISEASE_NM = #{diseaseNm} AND MEDICATION_YN = 'N'
